name: Agent Mittens: Fish Heist
description:
Agent Mittens: Fish Heist is a Stealth Platforming game where you do not directly control the main character. Distractions will frequently cause Agent Mittens to lose control! Make it to the end of each level and eat the fish without getting caught by the enemy.

Controls:

Left Click - shines laser pointer and opens/closes doors

W,A,S,D - controls the game camera

Good luck agent! The kingdom rests in your hands!

Created by: Mathieu, James and Will

Sound/Music: https://opengameart.org/

Pixel Art Font: https://fontmeme.com/pixel-fonts/

This game was created for Game Makers Toolkit 2020 game jam, where the theme was OUT OF CONTROL.
